trans-unit.source: Enables a workflow service to receive data n the form of parameters.<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent"></xref>
is interoperable with non-workflow WCF clients and services.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent.Parameters"></xref> collection is similar to the argument declaration on a C# method signature.The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent.Parameters"></xref> collection cannot contain arguments marked with <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute"></xref>, or of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref>.
Please use <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref> for these types of data.This is a sealed class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
A collection of key-value pairs with the keys containing the parameter names and the values containing the arguments.
An ordered collection of key-value pairs with the keys containing the parameter names and the values containing the arguments.
